channel.title: 华尔街日报

item.title: 轻点两下（或三下），你最喜欢的 iPhone 功能或应用程序就会出现。下面是你需要查看的 "设置 "菜单。

item.title: 百元大钞是美国最常见的纸币，但它的储钱功能远大于花钱功能
item.description:
The $100 bill is far and away the most common U.S. paper currency, but the bill is more effective for storing money than spending it https://t.co/GNiPiY4zzA https://t.co/GNiPiY4zzA

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 15, 2024

item.title: 中国政府表示不允许强制出售 TikTok，这限制了该应用程序所有者的选择，因为买家已开始排队竞购 TikTok 在美国的业务。
item.description:
The Chinese government is signaling that it won’t allow a forced sale of TikTok, limiting options for the app’s owners as buyers begin lining up to bid for its U.S. operations https://t.co/Xwyhvp3I2V https://t.co/Xwyhvp3I2V

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 15, 2024

item.title: 哈马斯呼吁巴勒斯坦人周五在耶路撒冷的阿克萨清真寺与以色列对抗，届时大批朝拜者将考验旨在斋月期间维持和平的以色列当局。
item.description:
Hamas has called for Palestinians to confront Israel at the Al Aqsa Mosque in Jerusalem Friday, when large numbers of worshipers will test Israeli authorities who aim to keep peace during Ramadan https://t.co/vCQg7GLOQk https://t.co/vCQg7GLOQk

item.title: 弗拉基米尔-普京已基本确定将赢得俄罗斯总统大选，但他仍在努力争取更高的投票率，以巩固其未来六年的执政地位。
item.description:
Vladimir Putin is all but guaranteed to win Russia’s presidential vote, but he is seeking a large turnout to anchor his next six years in power https://t.co/LJ6XhIGrhw https://t.co/LJ6XhIGrhw

item.title: 乘坐火车可以游览美国的大片土地，但这是否意味着这是一个好主意呢？一些旅行者说，即使经常出现延误和车速缓慢的情况，也没有什么比坐火车更好了。
item.description:
It’s possible to see large swathes of the U.S. by train, but does that mean it’s a good idea? Some travelers say that even with the frequent delays and slow speeds, nothing beats it. https://t.co/H3C5BXfvww https://t.co/H3C5BXfvww

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 15, 2024

item.title: 理查德-哈斯（Richard Haass）写道，以色列完全有权对哈马斯的袭击做出军事回应，但自 10 月 7 日以来，以色列在战术和战略上的选择却使其雪上加霜。
item.description:
Israel had every right to respond militarily to Hamas’s attack, but its tactical and strategic choices since Oct. 7 have left it worse off, writes Richard Haass https://t.co/jNMKzo4V3H https://t.co/jNMKzo4V3H

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 15, 2024

item.title: 巴哈马这个悠闲的小岛已成为富人和名人的热点。但这里也有许多值得体验的地方--从纯净的海滩到美味的路边餐馆，都适合我们这些普通人。
item.description:
This tiny, laid-back island in the Bahamas has become a hotspot for the rich and famous. But there's much to experience—from pristine beaches to delicious roadside restaurants—for the rest of us, too. https://t.co/fJWADqDlh5 https://t.co/fJWADqDlh5

item.title: 凯蒂-罗伊普（Katie Roiphe）在她的《个人空间》（Personal Space）专栏中写道："与前任共度时光--前提是对方不是你讨厌的人--是与曾经的自己重新建立联系的一种令人振奋的方式。
item.description:
Spending time with an ex-flame—assuming it’s one you don’t hate—is an invigorating way to reconnect with the person you used to be, writes Katie Roiphe in her Personal Space column https://t.co/65fPrxXBbP https://t.co/65fPrxXBbP

item.title: 🎧 听：在今天的《日报》播客中，詹姆斯-伦德尔（James Rundle）解释了一家广泛用于保险计费和支付的公司如何受到网络攻击，导致医院、药房和医疗集团陷入困境。
item.description:
🎧 Listen: In today’s episode of The Journal podcast, James Rundle explains how a cyberattack on a company widely used for insurance billing and payments has left hospitals, pharmacies and medical groups scrambling https://t.co/cvdqlo9T5T https://t.co/cvdqlo9T5T

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 15, 2024

item.title: "人们意识到，不住在洛杉矶或纽约也没关系"。亚特兰大大都会区长期以来一直是嘻哈艺术家、音乐家和职业运动员的聚集地，如今已成为电影和电视行业的圣地。

item.title: 哈佛大学对行为科学家弗朗西斯卡-吉诺（Francesca Gino）进行了调查，发现她的工作中包含被操纵的数据。

item.title: 在比佛利山庄，一座占地约 2.8 万平方英尺的别墅即将以 8500 万美元的价格上市。该别墅被称为 Theos 别墅，其设施堪比主题公园：保龄球馆、夜总会、射击场，甚至还有一个逃生隧道。
item.description:
In Beverly Hills, a roughly 28,000-square-foot compound is coming on the market for $85 million. Known as Villa Theos, it has amenities worthy of a theme park: a bowling alley, nightclub, shooting range, and even an escape tunnel https://t.co/6u3FwurnLO https://t.co/6u3FwurnLO

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 14, 2024
